DataElement.preferredName: Image Study Patient Medical History 10240 Character Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The words which describes a person"s abbreviated medical history relevant for the imaging event being performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Image Study Patient Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A radiographic technique used to evaluate a specific anatomic location for a specific purpose._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.  In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._A radiographic technique used to evaluate a specific anatomic location for a specific purpose.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A radiographic technique used to evaluate a specific anatomic location for a specific purpose.

Concepts.definition: A radiographic technique used to evaluate a specific anatomic location for a specific purpose.

Property.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 6/17/09 removed "additional" as qualifier per NCIA/VCDE recommendation.  2/11/09 meant to version not create new DEC 2693124; instead created v2 of a new DEC.  No V1 for this DEC.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: LT: A character string for one or more paragraphs with leading spaces significant; trailing spaces being non-significant.   It may contain the Graphic Character set and some Control Characters.   [Standard-based]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).

ValueDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 6/21/07-Released for NCIA CDE curation.  2007 DICOM Standard - Sections 5 & 6

DataElement.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElement.changeDescription: 6/16/09 - CDE superceded 2693140v2.0 to accomodate DICOM VD and removal of "Additional" as property qualifier.  2/10/09 CDE versioned due to DEC/OC change to Image Study concept (C63859) per Silver Rev changes.
